sure, if you have the user and IP of the other machine, and it has an ssh server installed
i used scp like this. scp user@shell.machine.here:/folder/here /to/my/directory/
and now i want to copy from my pc to the shell machine
So the other way would be scp /to/my/directory/ user@shell.machine.here:/folder/here/
